name: Project Flip
description:
@skslucher

A prototype

Aimed to mix the feel of Speed Racer '08 with One Finger Death Punch.

Control with just the mouse. Yep, just left and right click.

Left and right click to attack to the left and right.

Attack when cars are in your range, or else you'll spin out!

Music: Anamanaguchi - My Skateboard Will Go On
